resources.name: Rent&Play
resources.description: Rent&Play Insomnia requests for testing

resources.name: Create User
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
POST /users/
Host: http://api.restandplay.com.br
Authorization: None
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
	"nickname": "gui",
	"first_name": "Guilherme",
	"last_name": "Preveda",
	"cellphone": 49912345678,
	"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
	"password": 1234
}
```

#### Response example:

```
201 Created
```

```json
{
	"id": "23e25740-4467-448c-9378-7d6feb2ad56e",
	"nickname": "gui",
	"first_name": "Guilherme",
	"last_name": "Preveda",
	"cellphone": "49912345678",
	"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
	"wallet": "0.00"
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code      | Description                                                           |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 400 Bad Request | Unique fields already in use                                          |
| 400 Bad Request | Missing required fields                                               |
| 400 Bad Request | Invalid email                                                         |
| 400 Bad Request | Characters limit reached                                              |

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
POST /login/
Host: http://api.restandplay.com.br
Authorization: None
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
  "email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
  "password": 1234
}
```

#### Response example:

```
200 OK
```

```json
{
	"token": "45d1a9c3157e81bb87aa7e92b05b06e36520c9a0",
	"user": {
		"id": "23e25740-4467-448c-9378-7d6feb2ad56e",
		"nickname": "gui",
		"first_name": "Guilherme",
		"last_name": "Preveda",
		"cellphone": "49912345678",
		"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
		"wallet": "0.00"
	}
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code       | Description                                                           |
| ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 401 Unauthorized | Invalid username or password                                          |
| 400 Bad Request  | Missing required fields                                               |
| 400 Bad Request  | Invalid email                                                         |

resources.name: List Users
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
GET /users/
Host: http://api.rentandplay.com.br
Authorization: Token <token>
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

None

#### Response example:

```
200 OK
```

```json
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "23e25740-4467-448c-9378-7d6feb2ad56e",
			"nickname": "gui",
			"first_name": "Guilherme",
			"last_name": "Preveda",
			"cellphone": "49912345678",
			"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
			"wallet": "0.00"
		}
	]
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code        | Description                                                           |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Authentication credentials were not provided                          |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Invalid token                                                         |

resources.name: Update User
resources.description:
### Request params:

| Parâmetro           |   Tipo   | Descrição                                        |
| ------------------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| pk                  |   uuid   | Unique identificator for the User                |

### Request example:

```
PATCH /users/<uuid>/
Host: http://api.rentandplay.com.br
Authorization: Token <token>
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
	"nickname": "guilherme",
	"cellphone": 499125678
}
```

#### Response example:

```
200 OK
```

```json
{
	"id": "23e25740-4467-448c-9378-7d6feb2ad56e",
	"nickname": "guilherme",
	"first_name": "Guilherme",
	"last_name": "Preveda",
	"cellphone": "49987654321",
	"email": "guilherme@rentandplay.com.br",
	"wallet": "0.00"
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code        | Description                                                           |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Authentication credentials were not provided                          |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Invalid token                                                         |
| 403 Forbidden     | You do not have permission to perform this action                     |
| 404 Not Found     | Specified user was not found                                          |
| 400 Bad Request   | Unique fields already in use                                          |
| 400 Bad Request   | Invalid email                                                         |
| 400 Bad Request   | Characters limit reached                                              |

resources.name: Create Platform
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
POST /platforms/
Host: http://api.restandplay.com.br
Authorization: Token <token>
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
	"platform_api_id": 8,
	"name": "Google Play",
	"image_url": "https://media.rawg.io/media/games/fc3/fc30790a3b3c738d7a271b02c1e26dc2.jpg",
	"icon": "IoLogoGooglePlaystore"
}
```

#### Response example:

```
201 Created
```

```json
{
	"id": "f960c2af-93a3-4cb5-b73e-fc216d89a19f",
	"platform_api_id": 8,
	"name": "Google Play",
	"image_url": "https://media.rawg.io/media/games/fc3/fc30790a3b3c738d7a271b02c1e26dc2.jpg",
	"icon": "IoLogoGooglePlaystore"
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code        | Description                                                           |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Authentication credentials were not provided                          |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Invalid token                                                         |
| 403 Forbidden     | You do not have permission to perform this action                     |
| 403 Forbidden     | This platform already exists in the database                          |
| 400 Bad Request   | Characters limit reached                                              |
| 400 Bad Request   | Invalid URL                                                           |

resources.name: Create Game
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
POST /games/
Host: http://api.restandplay.com.br
Authorization: Token <token>
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
	"game_api_id": 484814,
	"name": "FOBIA St. Dinfna",
	"image_url": "https://media.rawg.io/media/resize/640/-/screenshots/783/7834def883283da72282f335ae9400c6.jpg",
	"release_date": "2022-06-28",
	"platforms": [
		"3467e93a-5e26-467a-a6db-0d1a0d457567", "ec5120b5-4daa-4090-b4b9-167491abec49", "f3f44a4d-62d7-4a2d-abc0-58369b28d5af"
	]
}
```

#### Response example:

```
201 Created
```

```json
{
	"id": "e1cde12d-14f9-450a-92b0-5994564a9a27",
	"game_api_id": 484814,
	"name": "FOBIA St. Dinfna",
	"image_url": "https://media.rawg.io/media/resize/640/-/screenshots/783/7834def883283da72282f335ae9400c6.jpg",
	"release_date": "2022-06-28",
	"platforms": [
		"f3f44a4d-62d7-4a2d-abc0-58369b28d5af",
		"3467e93a-5e26-467a-a6db-0d1a0d457567",
		"ec5120b5-4daa-4090-b4b9-167491abec49"
	]
}
```

### Errors:

| Error code        | Description                                                           |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Authentication credentials were not provided                          |
| 401 Unauthorized  | Invalid token                                                         |
| 403 Forbidden     | This game already exists in the database                              |
| 400 Bad Request   | Characters limit reached                                              |
| 400 Bad Request   | Invalid URL or date                                                   |

resources.name: Create Rent Account
resources.description:
### Request example:

```
POST /rent_accounts/
Host: http://api.restandplay.com.br
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-type: application/json
```

#### Request body:

```json
{
	"platform": "f960c2af-93a3-4cb5-b73e-fc216d89a19f",
	"login": "myrandomemail@rentandplay.com.br",
	"password": "12345678",
	"price_per_day": 2.50,
	"games": [
		{
			"game_api_id": 484814,
			"name": "FOBIA St. Dinfna",
			"image_url": "https://media.rawg.io/media/resize/640/-/screenshots/783/7834def883283da72282f335ae9400c6.jpg",
			"release_date": "2022-06-28",
			"platforms": [
				"3467e93a-5e26-467a-a6db-0d1a0d457567",
				"ec5120b5-4daa-4090-b4b9-167491abec49",
				"f3f44a4d-62d7-4a2d-abc0-58369b28d5af"
			]
		}
	]
}
```

#### Response example:

```
201 Created
```

```json
{
```
